## Runtime.ResourceTree.IReadOnlyResultResourceTree interface

Interface for a read-only result-based resource tree with navigation methods.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IReadOnlyResultResourceTree<T> extends IReadOnlyResultMap<ResourceName, IReadOnlyResourceTreeNode> 
```
